resources.string: This App is made for the students of Vit Vellore, but it will work with any ProntoNetworks host.

- New Material Theme 
 - Stable UI 
 - Choice for Auto-Login and Login on App Start 
 - Renewal Date Based Usage -

If your wifi is turned Off, app will show a button in bottom to turn wifi On and it will try to connect to VIT(2.4/5)G automatically.(If Mobile Data is turned On, it will turn off mobile-data automatically) Sometimes it doesn\'t connect to VIT(2.4/5)G in the first attempt, so try again, or manually connect from settings.

Enter your account details in the Acoounts Tab. You can have multiple accounts, just tap the account you want to use (a green dot will appear on that account card)

Once you Log-In you can view your Usage also. Only after logging-in you can see the button to see your usage as log-in Session Id changes at time of log-in. 

There is also a feature to set Auto-Timer Login in app, first select the frequency of Auto-Login and then when to cancel this Timer. You can also cancel all timers directly by clicking Cancel Instantly.
